title: Official letter to RiotKateyKhaos
body:
From The Resistance

I implore you, stop this bloody war.
Many keyboards have fallen casualties already
The resistance is dying and who knows the pure dangers of the flower emoticon
I the great and powerful wizard implore you!

Make a thread to Stop the war! GD must be reunited once more...

I beg of you please all powerful Riot save GD!

The Resistance- ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ{{summoner:12}} 


I
